messages.subject: guns/gore/military
messages.msgSnippet: Maybe because the courses are made for men? At 5-4 and in the Marines I was short. Several of the walls/logs were hard for me also but I made it. As for the
messages.messageBody:
Maybe because the courses are made for men? At 5-4 and in the Marines I was
short. Several of the walls/logs were hard for me also but I made it. As for
the rifle range I had not used a gun prior either. I had issues with the windage
clicks but qualified a Marksman. As for the hand gun I was a bad shot. I
qualified but just.
*****************************************************
<<<I only made it through the
obstacle course by the skin of my teeth though - being 4'11" seemed to be a
definite disadvantage. <g> >>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
